fullName: /api POST /orders When adding a new valid order, Then should get back approval with 200 response
/api POST /orders When adding a new valid order, Then should be able to retrieve it
/api POST /orders When adding an order without specifying product, stop and return 400
/api POST /orders When the user does not exist, return 404 response
/api DELETE /order When deleting an existing order, Then it should NOT be retrievable
/api GET /order When asked for an existing order, Then should retrieve it and receive 200 response
/api GET /order When asked for an non-existing order, Then should receive 404 response
